modName: Volsung_Otar_Nahkriin HQ overhaul 1k texture dragonpriest ma
descriptionHtml:
Current masks done:
Nahkriin____________the dragon language on the forehead says: Spirit Champion
Volsung____________ yes thats a septim! ;)
Otar_______________ the dragon language chiseled between the eyes says: Kill Mortal


Track this post for updates and new masks, for they will be added here and I will wait for a new file upload once im all done with the mask set!

As many might agree I found that the dragonpriest masks were just to plain and simple, thats why I made this mod. I Now added these overhauls because theres been so much positive responses.

Installation is simple:

Paste the folder into your existing game folder: Skyrim/steamapps/common/skyrim/

I also added a darkened hood texture that is nothing than darkened to match just a little more, expect this to be editted into a good looking and HQ hood!


Track this post (click on the goggles under the file statistics) for updates and new masks, for they will be added here and I will wait for a new file upload once im all done with the mask set!


enjoy


IMPORTANT!

File X is the complete and most recent file. It\'s advised to download this one and replace the old files - NEW? Download FILE_X

File 1 excludes my previous overhaul of the Nahkriin.
File 2 includes my previous overhaul of the Nahkriin.
File 3 is the Otar-only file, I add my mask overhauls here, download this if you allready have my Volsung and Nahkriin overhaul.
author: Remcees

files.name: FILE_1 Volsung overhaul by remcees
